duties_responsibilities.duty: Resolve customer problems and complaints with empathy and critical thinking.
Monitor, investigate, and research customer issues to identify areas for improvement.
Communicate new products and features to customers.
Act as a brand ambassador for the company and report product or technical issues to relevant teams.
Collaborate with product managers and specialists to provide feedback and enhance customer service.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent experience in a customer service role.
